hero.title: Fast Websites for Small Business
hero.subtitle: Professional landing pages and business websites delivered in days, not months. Simple pricing, clear timelines, guaranteed results.

problem.title: The Problem with Most Web Agencies
problem.subtitle: Traditional web development is slow, expensive, and unpredictable.

items.title: Months of Waiting
items.description: Most agencies take 2-6 months to deliver a simple website.

items.title: Hidden Costs
items.description: Prices balloon with endless revisions and additional features.

items.title: No Clear Timeline
items.description: Launch dates keep getting pushed back with vague excuses.

solution.title: Our Solution: Fast, Fixed-Price Websites
solution.subtitle: We deliver professional websites in days with transparent pricing and guaranteed deadlines.

items.title: Lightning Fast
items.description: Get your website live in 3-14 days. Not months. Not weeks. Days.

items.title: Fixed Pricing
items.description: Know exactly what you'll pay upfront. No surprises, no hidden fees.

items.title: Guaranteed Deadline
items.description: We commit to a delivery date and stick to it. Every single time.

services.name: Landing Pages
services.description: High-converting single-page sites perfect for campaigns, products, or services. Delivered in 3-5 days.

services.name: Business Websites
services.description: Professional multi-page websites with contact forms, portfolios, and service pages. Ready in 7-10 days.

services.name: Website Redesign
services.description: Refresh your existing website with modern design and better performance. Completed in 5-7 days.

services.name: SEO Basics
services.description: Essential optimization to help customers find you on Google. On-page SEO and technical improvements.

services.name: Integrations
services.description: Connect your website with booking systems, CRMs, payment gateways, and email marketing tools.

pricingPlans.name: Business
features: Custom design tailored to your brand

faq.question: How can you deliver websites so fast?
faq.answer: We use proven frameworks, pre-built components, and streamlined processes. Instead of reinventing the wheel for each project, we focus on customizing battle-tested solutions to your specific needs. This allows us to deliver professional results in days, not months.

faq.question: Do I own the website after it's delivered?
faq.answer: Yes, 100%. You own all the code, content, and design. We'll provide full access to everything along with documentation on how to make updates yourself. You're never locked into working with us.

faq.question: What if I need changes after the website is launched?
faq.answer: Each package includes one or more rounds of revisions before launch. After launch, we offer support packages starting at ‚Ç¨99/month for minor updates and maintenance. For larger changes or new features, we can provide a custom quote.

faq.question: Can you build custom features and functionality?
faq.answer: Absolutely. For standard business needs like contact forms, booking systems, or payment integration, we can handle it within our packages. For highly custom applications or complex systems, we'll provide a custom quote with an adjusted timeline.

faq.question: What about hosting and domain registration?
faq.answer: We can handle everything or work with your existing hosting provider. All packages include 1 year of hosting on reliable infrastructure. Domain registration is additional (typically ‚Ç¨10-15/year) and we can help you register one or transfer an existing domain.

faq.question: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
faq.answer: Yes. We offer support packages starting at ‚Ç¨99/month which include minor content updates, security patches, performance monitoring, and priority support. We're here to help your website succeed long-term.

faq.question: What if I'm not happy with the result?
faq.answer: We work closely with you throughout the process to ensure you're happy with every step. Each package includes revision rounds where you can request changes. We've never had a client we couldn't satisfy, but if something truly isn't working, we'll make it right.

faq.question: Can you help with content and copywriting?
faq.answer: Yes! While we expect you to provide key information about your business, we can help polish the copy and ensure it's clear, professional, and conversion-focused. Content writing services are available as an add-on.
